page.title: 18Event,Wick
page.content: A summer Barbecue has become an annual event at Pulteneytown Academy Primary School.This is run by the Parent Teachers' Association and each year has a different theme.When it took place in June 1985 we had a Spanish theme and pupils were encouraged to dress up.Before the main attraction of the day parents and children paraded to show off their costumes.Then came the highlight,the arrival of the matador and bull.The pantomime was certainly enjoyed by young and old as the bull showed its dislike of having its tail pulled.This was followed by five team games,with each team consisting of two adults and five children.Around the playground were various stalls.Many children had a photograph taken with the bull and the afternoon's events were all recorded on video.
